## X25519.generateKeyPair() method

Generates a key pair for X25519 (private and public key).

**Signature:**

```typescript
static generateKeyPair(): Promise<BytesKeyPair>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[BytesKeyPair](./crypto.byteskeypair.md)<!-- -->&gt;

A Promise that resolves to a BytesKeyPair object.
